pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profit = #{profit,jdbcType=REAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, = #{refundExpressNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_msg = #{refundMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refund_admin = #{refundAdmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_level = #{goodsLevel,jdbcType=BIT}, is_update_order = #{isUpdateOrder,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.member_id, 0 remark, a.pay_money, a.items, a.goods_num from s_shop_order a left join s_profit_log b on a.id = b.from_order_id where a.member_id = #{memberId} and a.`status` IN (2,3,4,5) and left(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.create_time), 7) = #{month} and ( b.id is null or b.from_member_level > 3) group by a.id

select b.id, a.from_member_id member_id, case when a.remark="会员推荐佣金" then 1 -- 会员业绩单 when a.member_level=3 then 2 -- 店长业绩单 when a.member_level>3 then 3 -- 渠道商业绩单 end remark, b.pay_money, b.items, b.goods_num, b.sn, b.pay_time, left(FROM_UNIXTIME(b.create_time), 7) msg from s_profit_log a join s_shop_order b on a.from_order_id = b.id where a.member_id = #{memberId} and (a.status = 1 or a.status = 2) and ( (a.money = b.pay_price*0.05 and a.member_level = 2) or -- 会员自己给自己下单,渠道商下会员下单，店长下会员下单，会员下游客下单 a.money > b.pay_price*0.09 -- 渠道商自己下单，店长自己下单，渠道商下游客下单，店长下游客下单 ) and a.type = 1 and a.member_level > 0
